content.title: Practice Social Distancing
content.tip: To be safe you should practice social distancing and stay away at least 2m from others

content.title: Quarantine
content.tip: Please monitor your symptoms and self-isolate for 14 more days. After this period you wil lbe considered healthy again

content.title: stay home idiot
content.tip: We wish you a speedy recovery. Please monitor your symptoms and stay in quarantine as long as you've been advised by your doctor.
content.button_text: I had no symptoms for 48 hours
